dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Sssss... What weakling dare approach Verminbane?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. Let's talk.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Hah! Verminbane knows no peace!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no trouble. Can we coexist?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Verminbane sees only prey and enemies. You are not worthy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I shall leave you be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Verminbane will ignore your existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will prove my strength!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength? Verminbane will crush you like the feeble being you are!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? Verminbane accepts! Pathetic creature.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield. You are strong.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weakling! Verminbane will leave you broken.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to yield. Let's settle this.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defiance? Verminbane enjoys your spirit. Join me in the hunt, or be hunted.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. Prepare for a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Bravery, yet folly. Verminbane will make you regret your foolishness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see your power. I retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowardice. Verminbane will not forget your weakness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight to the end!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Verminbane will relish in your suffering.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not bow to the likes of you!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prideful fool. Verminbane will teach you respect.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the disrespect. Can we start over?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies mean nothing to Verminbane. The only language you will understand is pain.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I surrender. Spare me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Spare you? Verminbane finds your pleas amusing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not beg. Face me!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge accepted. Verminbane will enjoy breaking you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand my ground. Let's settle this.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Courage? Verminbane respects boldness. Join forces, or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to join forces. I will face whatever comes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness. Verminbane will crush you like the rest.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I accept your offer. Let us hunt together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise decision. Verminbane welcomes a new minion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not afraid of you. Prepare for a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish bravado. Verminbane will enjoy breaking your spirit.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense danger. I retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowardice. Verminbane will remember your fear.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let's do this! I am ready for a battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Entertaining. Verminbane will crush you in due time.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I don't have time for this. Move or suffer!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impatient creature. Verminbane will make you regret your hastiness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave you in peace if you step aside.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful intentions? Verminbane's answer is clear - attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Time for talk is over. Face me!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words. Verminbane will enjoy proving you wrong.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Wait, I did not mean it!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Too late. Verminbane's fury is unleashed!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Bring it on! I am ready for a fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. Verminbane will crush you swiftly.
